title: 5v5 Ranked Team LFM
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team got a Daily Playtime Shedule so pls be rly active.
-Playtime is around 20oClock CET for atleast 2 Games.
-Be able to hold our shedule atleast 4 times a week.
-Iam looking for Top/Mid and Jng aswell as for some subs.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who just play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for 
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.




if ur interrested apply here and/or addme ingame for a chat.

Strawhatya :)

replies.body:
I am interested for your Team. I am Gold 2 and 17 years old (almost 18, but I am not a little kid that cries and screams all time ;)) I added you Ingame and would be happy if we could talk on TS3 or in the chat (I prefer TS3, so you get the other person better to know).
EDIT: Jungle main
